00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: activity_participation_rate
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Measures the proportion of agents actively participating in planning discussions.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: decision_time_seconds
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Tracks the time taken from activity start to decision finalization.

tags.description: Name of the agent involved in the decision process.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: activity_interaction_count
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Counts the number of interactions between agents during planning sessions.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: preference_agreement_score
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Represents the degree of agreement on a preferred activity among agents.

tags.description: Name of the agent involved in the agreement.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: decision_conflict_count
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Tallies the number of conflicts or disagreements encountered during planning.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: activity_satisfaction_score
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Satisfaction level of agents with the planned activity.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: activity_selection_efficiency
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Measures the efficiency of activity selection process, such as the number of iterations before decision.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: resource_utilization_percentage
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Indicates the efficiency of resource usage during planning and organization.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: decision_reversals_count
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Counts how many times a decision was changed or reversed during planning.

00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.name: agent_influence_score
00cd9915-bdbc-460a-b16a-09f4cff17c2f.description: Quantifies the influence of each agent on the final decision.

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: agent_workout_sessions_total
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Total number of workout sessions undertaken by each gym buddy.

tags.description: Name of the agent (e.g., Alex, Jordan).

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: agent_workout_compliance_gauge
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Current level of workout compliance or consistency for each agent.

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: social_support_interaction_total
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Number of interactions or support actions exchanged between agents.

tags.description: Name of the agent initiating or involved in support interaction.
Name of the support partner agent.

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: average_response_time_seconds
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Average time taken by agents to respond to workout prompts or support requests.

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: workout_session_duration_seconds
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Duration of workout sessions to assess engagement levels.

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: motivation_level_score
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Self-reported or assessed motivation level score for each agent.

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: coach_feedback_score
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Score representing feedback from coaching or support received.

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: workout_goal_achievement_percentage
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Percentage of workout goals achieved by each agent.

7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.name: peer_support_score
7ed08ba7-52cc-4d27-a3b9-ddf3e3951b7a.description: Aggregate score of peer support activities and perception.
